title: 有什么方法可以防核电站爆炸
txt_content:
有什么办法可以防止工业时代2实验班1.7.2 核电站以及工业TNT造成的爆炸？
只要不破坏方块就行！！！

replies.author: QuantumCraft
replies.txt_content:
wahaha216的回答虽然正确
但是ic核电站爆炸最大范围为0后会导致不爆炸，如果有人建造MOX核电站可以无限刷电
建议这样
IC2.ini
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 0
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 1

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
修改配置文件即可
IC2.ini
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 0
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 0

replies.author: Kigmaidou
replies.txt_content:
config下找到ic2.ini打开找到如下字段

Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 60  #核弹的爆炸；最大功率，TNT是4。
Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 45  #一个核反应堆的最大爆炸威力，TNT是4。
复制代码

修改为0为不会爆炸，修改为1仅炸毁本身。服务器建议修改为1。
